sense.def:
The exterior of something
je zunanja površina nečesa.

seg.quote: Keep your car exterior in good condition.

sense.def:
One's exterior
sta človekov običajni zunanji videz in človekov običajno vedênje.

seg.quote: Beneath his professional doctor's exterior, he was wildly fun-loving and reckless.

sense.def:
Exterior
je tak, ki obstaja ali se dogaja zunaj človeka ali stvari.

seg.quote: Exterior drains must be kept clear.
